hazma.rambo.generate_phase_space_point¶

hazma.rambo.generate_phase_space_point(masses, cme, num_fsp)¶

Generate a phase space point given a set of final state particles and a given center of mass energy.

Parameters:

masses : numpy.ndarray

List of masses of the final state particles.

cme : double

Center-of-mass-energy of the process.

mat_elem_sqrd : (double)(numpy.ndarray) {lambda klist: 1}

Function for the matrix element squared.
Returns:

phase_space_points : numpy.ndarray

List of four momenta and a event weight. The returned numpy array is of the form {ke1, kx1, ky1, kz1, …, keN, kxN, kyN, kzN, weight}.
